channel.title: Need help quick
channel.description:
[b]I've searched for the answer to fix this error but its nowhere to be found , so I'll post it here [/b]
[i]This is my first time going through 508 sources so I may not know how to fix it. The problem is that after I run the source then the client , the client just turns all white... any idea on how to fix?
Just to know : I already portfowarded correctly , made the compiler and run from client and source work , have a windows 7 laptop , and have java. I know I have all these becuase I've made 317 servers and people played. <-- Is there anything more I need to have to run a 508 source?[/i] [b]Reply with as much information as possible , I accept links too Thanks for the help -Reamm[/b]

item.title: Need help quick
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

I’ve searched for the answer to fix this error but its nowhere to be found , so I’ll post it here

[i]This is my first time going through 508 sources so I may not know how to fix it.
The problem is that after I run the source then the client , the client just turns all white… any idea on how to fix?

Just to know : I already portfowarded correctly , made the compiler and run from client and source work , have a windows 7 laptop , and have java. I know I have all these becuase I’ve made 317 servers and people played. <-- Is there anything more I need to have to run a 508 source?[/i]
Reply with as much information as possible , I accept links too Thanks for the help -Reamm
